text: @SpeakerPelosi Yes PELOSI the American people expect a well coordinated coronavirus response & for your information that is exactly what President Trump has/is delivering. WHAT IS APPALLING/DISGRACEFUL IS THE DemocRAT VILE/DISINGENUOUS/MINDLESS ATTACKS DIRECTED BY YOU/SCHUMER FOR POLITICAL GAIN https://t.co/GGYcpYYn58

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
